kit.leader_skill: "Exploding Rage" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +220%

super_attack.name: Gigantic Impact

passive_skill.name: Terrifying Surge of Ki
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's entry: (Once) Ki +4 and damage reduction rate 40% up for 1 turn; (Once) Ki +3 and damage reduction rate 30% up for 3 turns; (Once) ATK & DEF 260% up; (Once) Guards all attacks; For every attack performed: (Forever) Ki +1 (up to +5); (Forever) DEF 50% up (up to 400%); (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit 20% up (up to 100%); For every attack received: (Forever) Ki +1 (up to +5); (Forever) ATK 40% up (up to 300%); (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack (up to 4 times); For every Super Attack the enemy launches at the character: (Forever) ATK & DEF 30% up; When receiving an Unarmed Super Attack: Great chance of nullifying it, ATK 260% up temporarily and countering with tremendous power

active_skill.name: Pure Heart and Wrathful Power
active_skill.effect: Massively raises ATK temporarily and; causes ultimate damage to enemy;; DEF +60%; Foresees enemy's; Super Attack for 1 turn
